data.text: @RhodaWatkins10 @NanniMagee @sajidjavid I'm sorry you are suffering and  again the Republicans are running on not covering pre-existing. After much of this is because they refused to get vaccinated and wear masks. This sucks.
@RhodaWatkins10 @sajidjavid My heart aches for you. Feel better soon.🙏🏾❤🙏🏾

@RhodaWatkins10 @ShaneyWright @sajidjavid I know how you feel. Fibromyalgia ruined my life. I can’t work. Now I just sit and watch life go by. So sorry. I hear long covid is really bad. I’m doing everything I can to protect myself from contracting it, but I live in Florida, so it’s hard.   🤞🏻🙏🏻❤️
@RhodaWatkins10 @sajidjavid I’m so sorry to hear you are still struggling ☹️
